content:
You have decided to wait 10 time steps for income and tax revenue to increase.

After 10 time steps, the new city status:
Population: 3190 (population growth by birth rate)
Funds: 195000 + 10 \* (1000000 + tax revenue)
Income: 1000000 + tax revenue (72% happiness \* $1000/resident)
Education Level: 61%
Employment Rate: 85%
Crime Rate: 8%
Health Level: 25%
Birth rate: 6.125%
Happiness level: 72%
Tax Revenue: $241250 (72% happiness \* $1000/resident)

Please let me know if you want to construct any other building or make any other actions in your city.
